title: The Report
creator_contributor_role: Royal North Shore Hospital of Sydney, production company
New South Wales. Dept. of Health, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Typists - vocational guidence
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Life skills
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Stress management
description: A dramatised film of a day in the life of an assistant personnel manager. An annual report is overdue and as a result of his own inefficiency, the main character allows the day's events to finally overwhelm him. Ideal discussion promoter about how to organise commitments so as to cope effectively with the demads of work and personal life. Cinematography by Tom Cowan. Written and directed by Tony Wheeler.
